Package org.flowvisor.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FVUserAPI  
    FVUserAPIJSON  
    FVUserAPIXML  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APIAuth
    Figure out if this request should be allowed or not
    APIServer
    This is stolen pretty directly from the apache-xml example code.
    APIUserCred
    Thread-local list of this User's credentials used as a HACK to get around the fact that servlets are stateless
    DeviceAdvertisement  
    FlowChange
    Object that holds a change to the flowspace
    FlowSpaceChangeRequest  
    FlowTableCallback  
    FlowVisorLoginService  
    FVCtl
    Client side stand alone command-line tool for invoking the FVUserAPI This is pretty hacky and just for testing; people should write their own clients and/or call the XMLRPC directly
    FVRpcErrorLogger
    A wrapper around FVLog for the XMLRPC webserver
    FVUserAPIImpl
    This is the actual UserAPI that gets wrapped via XMLRPC In theory ("God willin' and the creek dun rise"), XMLRPC calls will call these function directly
    FVUserAPIJSONImpl  
    FVUserAPIXMLRPCImpl  
    JettyServer  
    JSONRPCService  
    LinkAdvertisement  
    SSLWebServer  
    TopologyCallback
